## Load Libraries

```{r message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(plotrix) 
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
library(seacarb) 
library(pheatmap)
library(tidyverse)
library(genefilter)
library(cowplot)
library(lsmeans)
library(ontologyIndex)
library(ontologySimilarity)
library(data.table)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(colorRamps)
library(GSEABase)
library(here)
```


```{r}
#read in Pver_genome_assembly_v1.0.gff3 and filter for just genes

Pver_genome_assembly_v1.0.gff3 <- read.delim("../Data/WGBS/Pver_genome_assembly_v1.0.gff3", header=F, comment.char="#") 

Pver_genome_assembly_v1.0.gene.gff3 <- Pver_genome_assembly_v1.0.gff3[Pver_genome_assembly_v1.0.gff3$V3 == "gene",] 
write_delim(Pver_genome_assembly_v1.0.gene.gff3, "../Data/WGBS/Pver_genome_assembly_v1.0.gene.gff3")
```
